# Exabeam CIM alignment notes

Given an Objective YAML and a description of available telemetry, create an Exabeam CIM alignment note:
- required_entities list
- mapping_notes bullets (source field -> cim field)
- validation checklist
- placeholder detection logic section

Output YAML or Markdown, but be consistent and easy to paste into `detections/exabeam-cim/`.
